root.title: thomson mckinnon unit cmo offer price
root.body: thomson mckinnon mortgag asset corp unit thomson mckinnon inc offer 100 mln dlr collater mortgag oblig three tranch includ float rate invers float rate cmo the float rate class amount 60 mln dlr It averag life 7.11 year matur 2018 the cmo initi coupon 7.0375 pct reset 60 basi point libor say sole manag thomson mckinnon the invers floater total 4.8 mln dlr It averag life 13.49 year matur 2018 these cmo give initi coupon 11-1/2 pct price 104.40 subsequ rate invers floater equal 11-1/2 pct minu product three time libor minu pct A thomson offic explain coupon invers float rate tranch would increas libor declin `` the yield float opposit libor say the fixed-r tranch total 35.2 mln dlr It averag life 3.5 year matur 2016 the cmo assign 7.65 pct coupon par price the issu rate aaa standard poor secur feder home loan mortgag corp freddi mac certif
